Description:

Ridge View Residential College is one of the 4 Residential Colleges in NUS. 

It offers 4 room types, Single room and Double room with both air-con and non air-con options, and has a meal plan included.

College of Alice and Peter Tan is one of the 4 Residential Colleges in NUS.

It offers 4 room types, Single room and 6 Bedroom Apartment with both air-con and non air-con options, and has a meal plan included.
AY 23/24 Fees (Weekly):
Single (AC) : S$154
Single (Non-AC) : S$136
6BR Apt (AC) : S$165
6BR Apt (Non-AC) : S$148
